info.title: Document AI API
info.description: Extract structured data including named fields, tables, barcodes, classifications, and summaries from common document formats, scanned documents, and photos of documents using AI.  Also supports handwriting and low quality photos and scans, as well as digital document input.  Supports a wide range of languages, and is able to analyze and infer semantic structure from the visual layout for documents.

post.summary: Enforce Policies to a Document to allow or block it using Advanced AI
post.description: Enforce Policies to a Document to allow or block it using Advanced AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Input request, including document and policy rules

post.summary: Answer Questions about a Document in a structured way using Advanced AI
post.description: Answer boolean (yes/no), multiple-choice and free-response questions about the contents of a document using Advanced AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Input request, including document and questions

post.summary: Extract Text from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract raw text from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG and WEBP.  Supports a wide range of languages.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images.  Set to Deterministic to directly extract text from digital documents without using AI.

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Field Values from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract Field Values (e.g. Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Business Card Phone Number, etc.) from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG and WEBP.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: FieldNames
parameters.description: Desired fields to extract, comma separated

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Field Values from a Document using Advanced AI
post.description: Extract Field Values (e.g. Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Business Card Phone Number, etc.) from a document using Advanced AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG and WEBP.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Input request, including document file as byte array, and information on which fields to extract

post.summary: Extract Tables of Data from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract Tables, comprised of rows and columns of data, from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG and WEBP.  Consumeds 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Barcodes of from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract all barcodes from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG, HEIC and WEBP.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract All Fields and Tables of Data from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract all Fields and Tables, comprised of rows and columns of data, from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG and WEBP.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: preprocessing
parameters.description: Optional: Set the level of image pre-processing to enhance accuracy.  Possible values are 'Auto' (default), 'Paged', and 'Compatability'.  Use 'Paged' to treat each page as a separate document for extraction (requires Advanced recognitionMode).  Default is Auto.

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Classification or Category from a Document using AI
post.description: Extract Classification or Category (e.g. Invoice, Receipt, Tax Form, or Form 1040, Form 1040 EZ, etc.) from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG and WEBP.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: Categories
parameters.description: Desired classification to extract

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Classification or Category from a Document using Advanced AI
post.description: Extract Classification or Category (e.g. Invoice, Receipt, Tax Form, or Form 1040, Form 1040 EZ, etc.) from a document using Advanced AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG and WEBP.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

post.summary: Extract Summary from a Document using AI
post.description: Creates a 1 paragraph summary of the input document using Artificial Intelligence.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG and WEBP.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Optional; Three-letter language code (ISO 639) for the summary.  Default is ENG.  Possible language codes are: AAR,ABK,ACE,ACH,ADA,ADY,AFA,AFH,AFR,AIN,AKA,AKK,ALB,ALE,ALG,ALT,AMH,ANG,ANP,APA,ARA,ARC,ARG,ARM,ARN,ARP,ART,ARW,ASM,AST,ATH,AUS,AVA,AVE,AWA,AYM,AZE,BAD,BAI,BAK,BAL,BAM,BAN,BAQ,BAS,BAT,BEJ,BEL,BEM,BEN,BER,BHO,BIH,BIK,BIN,BIS,BLA,BNT,BOD,BOS,BRA,BRE,BTK,BUA,BUG,BUL,BUR,BYN,CAD,CAI,CAR,CAT,CAU,CEB,CEL,CES,CHA,CHB,CHE,CHG,CHI,CHK,CHM,CHN,CHO,CHP,CHR,CHU,CHV,CHY,CMC,CNR,COP,COR,COS,CPE,CPF,CPP,CRE,CRH,CRP,CSB,CUS,CYM,CZE,DAK,DAN,DAR,DAY,DEL,DEN,DEU,DGR,DIN,DIV,DOI,DRA,DSB,DUA,DUM,DUT,DYU,DZO,EFI,EGY,EKA,ELL,ELX,ENG,ENM,EPO,EST,EUS,EWE,EWO,FAN,FAO,FAS,FAT,FIJ,FIL,FIN,FIU,FON,FRA,FRE,FRM,FRO,FRR,FRS,FRY,FUL,FUR,GAA,GAY,GBA,GEM,GEO,GER,GEZ,GIL,GLA,GLE,GLG,GLV,GMH,GOH,GON,GOR,GOT,GRB,GRC,GRE,GRN,GSW,GUJ,GWI,HAI,HAT,HAU,HAW,HEB,HER,HIL,HIM,HIN,HIT,HMN,HMO,HRV,HSB,HUN,HUP,HYE,IBA,IBO,ICE,IDO,III,IJO,IKU,ILE,ILO,INA,INC,IND,INE,INH,IPK,IRA,IRO,ISL,ITA,JAV,JBO,JPN,JPR,JRB,KAA,KAB,KAC,KAL,KAM,KAN,KAR,KAS,KAT,KAU,KAW,KAZ,KBD,KHA,KHI,KHM,KHO,KIK,KIN,KIR,KMB,KOK,KOM,KON,KOR,KOS,KPE,KRC,KRL,KRO,KRU,KUA,KUM,KUR,KUT,LAD,LAH,LAM,LAO,LAT,LAV,LEZ,LIM,LIN,LIT,LOL,LOZ,LTZ,LUA,LUB,LUG,LUI,LUN,LUO,LUS,MAC,MAD,MAG,MAH,MAI,MAK,MAL,MAN,MAO,MAP,MAR,MAS,MAY,MDF,MDR,MEN,MGA,MIC,MIN,MIS,MKD,MKH,MLG,MLT,MNC,MNI,MNO,MOH,MON,MOS,MRI,MSA,MUL,MUN,MUS,MWL,MWR,MYA,MYN,MYV,NAH,NAI,NAP,NAU,NAV,NBL,NDE,NDO,NDS,NEP,NEW,NIA,NIC,NIU,NLD,NNO,NOB,NOG,NON,NOR,NQO,NSO,NUB,NWC,NYA,NYM,NYN,NYO,NZI,OCI,OJI,ORI,ORM,OSA,OSS,OTA,OTO,PAA,PAG,PAL,PAM,PAN,PAP,PAU,PEO,PER,PHI,PHN,PLI,POL,PON,POR,PRA,PRO,PUS,QUE,RAJ,RAP,RAR,ROA,ROH,ROM,RON,RUM,RUN,RUP,RUS,SAD,SAG,SAH,SAI,SAL,SAM,SAN,SAS,SAT,SCN,SCO,SEL,SEM,SGA,SGN,SHN,SID,SIN,SIO,SIT,SLA,SLK,SLO,SLV,SMA,SME,SMI,SMJ,SMN,SMO,SMS,SNA,SND,SNK,SOG,SOM,SON,SOT,SPA,SQI,SRD,SRN,SRP,SRR,SSA,SSW,SUK,SUN,SUS,SUX,SWA,SWE,SYC,SYR,TAH,TAI,TAM,TAT,TEL,TEM,TER,TET,TGK,TGL,THA,TIB,TIG,TIR,TIV,TKL,TLH,TLI,TMH,TOG,TON,TPI,TSI,TSN,TSO,TUK,TUM,TUP,TUR,TUT,TVL,TWI,TYV,UDM,UGA,UIG,UKR,UMB,UND,URD,UZB,VAI,VEN,VIE,VOL,VOT,WAK,WAL,WAR,WAS,WEL,WEN,WLN,WOL,XAL,XHO,YAO,YAP,YID,YOR,YPK,ZAP,ZBL,ZEN,ZGH,ZHA,ZHO,ZND,ZUL,ZUN,ZXX,ZZA.

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Intelligently Split a Combined Document into Sub-Documents using AI
post.description: Analyzes a document containing multiple sub-documents (such as a scanned batch of ID cards, forms, or mixed documents) and intelligently splits it into separate sub-documents.  Uses AI to detect document boundaries based on visual content, headers, names, and document types.  Returns the page ranges and PDF bytes for each identified sub-document.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, XLSX, PPTX, EML, MSG, JPG, PNG and WEBP.  Consumes 100 API calls per page.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document containing multiple sub-documents to split

post.summary: Extract Text from a Document using AI as a Batch Job
post.description: Creates an async batch job for processing a large document as an AI batch job.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.  Supports a wide range of languages.  Requires Managed Instance or Private Cloud deployment.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Field Values from a Document using Advanced AI as a Batch Job
post.description: Creates an async batch job for processing a large document as an AI batch job.  Extract Field Values (e.g. Invoice Number, Invoice Date, Business Card Phone Number, etc.) from a document using Advanced AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.  Requires Managed Instance or Private Cloud deployment.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Input document and parameters

post.summary: Extract All Fields and Tables of Data from a Document using AI as a Batch Job
post.description: Creates an async batch job for processing a large document as an AI batch job.  Extract all Fields and Tables, comprised of rows and columns of data, from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.  Requires Managed Instance or Private Cloud deployment.

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

post.summary: Extract Classification or Category from a Document using AI as a Batch Job
post.description: Creates an async batch job for processing a large document as an AI batch job.  Extract Classification or Category (e.g. Invoice, Receipt, Tax Form, or Form 1040, Form 1040 EZ, etc.) from a document using AI.  Input document formats supported include DOCX, PDF, PNG and JPG.  Requires Managed Instance or Private Cloud deployment.

parameters.name: Categories
parameters.description: Desired classification to extract

parameters.name: recognitionMode
parameters.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Advanced (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

parameters.name: InputFile
parameters.description: Input document, or photos of a document, to extract data from

get.summary: Get the status and result of an Extract Document Batch Job
get.description: Returns the result of the Async Job - possible states can be STARTED or COMPLETED.  This API is only available for Cloudmersive Managed Instance and Private Cloud deployments.

parameters.name: AsyncJobID
parameters.description: Job ID for the batch job to get the status of

AdvancedExtractClassificationRequest.description: Request to perform an AI document classification on a document

InputFile.description: Input document file to perform the operation on as a byte array

Preprocessing.description: Optional: Set the level of image pre-processing to enhance accuracy.  Possible values are 'Auto', 'SmoothEdges', 'SmoothEdgesPlus', 'Compatability' and 'None'.  Default is Auto.  Set to SmoothEdges to smooth harsh edges in the input image to enhance recognition accuracy.  Set to SmoothEdgesPlus to smooth harsh edges to a higher degree.  Set to Compatability for maximum PDF feature compatability.

ResultCrossCheck.description: Optional: Set the level of output accuracy cross-checking to perform on the input.  Possible values are 'None', 'Advanced', 'Ultra' and 'Hyper'.  Default is None.  Ultra and Hyper will produce the highest accuracy but at the cost of longer processing times.

MaximumPagesProcessed.description: Optional: Limit the number of pages processed

RotateImageDegrees.description: Optional: Rotate the input image before recognition by the specified number of degrees; valid values range from -360 to +360.

AdvancedExtractFieldsRequest.description: Request to perform an AI field extraction on a document

InputFile.description: Input document file to perform the operation on as a byte array

FieldsToExtract.description: Fields to extract from the document

MaximumPagesProcessed.description: Optional: Limit the number of pages processed

Preprocessing.description: Optional: Set the level of image pre-processing to enhance accuracy.  Possible values are 'Auto', 'SmoothEdges', 'SmoothEdgesPlus', 'ContrastEdges', 'ContrastEdgesPlus', 'Invert', 'Binarize', 'Compatability' and 'None'.  Default is Auto.  Set to SmoothEdges to smooth harsh edges in the input image to enhance recognition accuracy.  Set to SmoothEdgesPlus to smooth harsh edges to a higher degree.  Set to ContrastEdges and ContrastEdgesPlus to enhance contrast and readability for low quality black and white or grayscale images.  Set to Invert to invert the input image.  Set to Binarize to binarize the input image.  Set to Compatability for maximum PDF feature compatability.

ResultCrossCheck.description: Optional: Set the level of output accuracy cross-checking to perform on the input.  Possible values are 'None', 'Advanced' and 'Ultra'.  Default is None.  Ultra will produce the highest accuracy but at the cost of longer processing times.

RotateImageDegrees.description: Optional: Rotate the input image before recognition by the specified number of degrees; valid values range from -360 to +360.

DocumentAdvancedClassificationResult.description: Result of classifying a document using AI

DocumentCategoryResult.description: Category applied to the document; if a category could not be identified then "other" will be used.  Spaces are replaced with underscores.

ConfidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0.0 and 1.0, where values > 0.8 indicate high confidence

CategoryDescription.description: Optional but recommended: Description of the classification in natural langugage

DocumentClassificationResult.description: Result of classifying a document using AI

DocumentCategoryResult.description: Category applied to the document; if a category could not be identified then "other" will be used.  Spaces are replaced with underscores.

InputFile.description: Input file as a byte array

Rules.description: Rules to apply to the document

RecognitionMode.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Normal (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

DocumentPolicyResult.description: Result of performing a document policy enforcement operation

CleanResult.description: True if the document complies with all of the policies, and false if it does not

RiskScore.description: Risk score between 0.0 and 1.0 where values above 0.5 are increasing levels of risk

AnswerValue.description: Answer response value, formatted as a string, for this question.  Boolean questions will return YES or NO.

AnswerRationale.description: Rationale explaining why this answer was given

ConfidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0.0 and 1.0 where values above 0.8 indicate high confidence

DocumentQuestionAnswersResult.description: Result of performing a document question answering operation

Successful.description: True if the operation was completed successfully, or false otherwise

ConfidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0.0 and 1.0 where values above 0.8 indicate high confidence

QuestionId.description: Unique ID of the question, e.g. 1 or 2A

QuestionText.description: Question in natural language to ask of the document where the answer resolves to YES or NO, e.g. 'Is this document signed and countersigned by both parties?'

DocumentQuestionChoiceItem.description: Possible response choice for a multiple-choice question

ChoiceId.description: Unique ID of the response choice, e.g. 3C

ChoiceText.description: Description text of this choice, e.g. 'Delaware'

QuestionId.description: Unique ID of the question, e.g. 7 or 5A

QuestionText.description: Question in natural language to ask of the document where the answer resolves to a free response, e.g. 'Who is the counterparty in this agreement?'

QuestionId.description: Unique ID of the question, e.g. 1 or 2A

QuestionText.description: Question in natural language to ask of the document where the answer resolves to one of a fixed number of provided choices, e.g. 'What is the governing law of this agreement?'

ResponseChoices.description: Possible response choices for the multiple-choice question

InputFile.description: Input file as a byte array

QuestionsYesNo.description: Optional: Yes or No boolean questions to answer about the document

QuestionsMultipleChoice.description: Optional: Multiple choice questions to answer about the document

QuestionsFreeResponse.description: Optional: Free response questions to answer about the document

RecognitionMode.description: Optional; Recognition mode - Normal (default) provides the highest accuracy but slower speed, while Normal provides faster response but lower accuracy for low quality images

ExtractBarcodesAiResponse.description: Result of extracting barcodes from a document

BarcodeResults.description: Table value results from the extraction operation

ExtractDocumentBatchJobResult.description: Result of performing a split document batch job

AsyncJobID.description: When creating a job, an Async Job ID is returned.  Use the GetAsyncJobStatus API to check on the status of this job using the AsyncJobID and get the result when it finishes

ExtractDocumentJobStatusResult.description: Result of performing a batch job operation

Successful.description: True if the operation to check the status of the job was successful, false otherwise

AsyncJobStatus.description: Returns the job status of the Async Job, if applicable.  Possible states are STARTED and COMPLETED

ExtractFieldsAdvancedResponse.description: Result of extracting fields from a document

Results.description: Field value results from the extraction operation

ConfidenceScore.description: Confidence score between 0.0 and 1.0, where values > 0.8 indicate high confidence

ExtractFieldsAndTablesResponse.description: Result of extracting fields from a document

FieldResults.description: Field value results from the extraction operation

TableResults.description: Table value results from the extraction operation

ExtractFieldsResponse.description: Result of extracting fields from a document

Results.description: Field value results from the extraction operation

ExtractTablesResponse.description: Result of extracting tables from a document

TableResults.description: Table value results from the extraction operation

ExtractTextResponse.description: Result of extracting text from a document

PageResults.description: Page results from the extraction operation

BarcodeType.description: Type of the barcode identified, possible values are: AZTEC, CODABAR, CODE_39, CODE_93, CODE_128, DATA_MATRIX, EAN_8, EAN_13, ITF, MAXICODE, PDF_417, QR_CODE, RSS_14, RSS_EXPANDED, UPC_A, UPC_E, All_1D, UPC_EAN_EXTENSION, MSI, PLESSEY, IMB, UNKNOWN

BarcodeValue.description: Value of the barcode as a string

ExtractedTextPage.description: Extracted page from an input document

FieldAdvancedValue.description: Field value result of extracting fields from a document

FieldName.description: Name of the field (note that spaces will be replaced with underscore)

FieldStringValue.description: String value of the field that was extractged from the document

FieldToExtract.description: Field to extract from a document using AI

FieldName.description: Name of the field to extract

FieldOptional.description: Optional: True if the field is optional, false if required (default)

FieldDescription.description: Optional but recommended: Description of the field - use this to describe what the field is, how it is formatted, what is unique about it, etc.

FieldExample.description: Optional: Example label or value of the field

FieldValue.description: Field value result of extracting fields from a document

FieldName.description: Name of the field (note that spaces will be replaced with underscore)

FieldStringValue.description: Primary or first string value of the field that was extractged from the document

AdditionalFieldStringValues.description: Additional values for this field when the same field is present with multiple values, for example, if two instances of the same form occur in the same document

RuleType.description: Possible values are ALLOW and DENY

RuleDescription.description: Description of the rule in natural language, e.g. Do not allow documents that contain offensive language

PolicyRuleViolation.description: Instances of a policy rule violation

RuleId.description: ID of the rule; if no ID was supplied, the ID is the 1-based index of the rule

RuleViolationRiskScore.description: Risk score between 0.0 and 1.0 where values above 0.5 are increasing levels of risk

RuleViolationRationale.description: AI natural language rationale for why this policy was violated

SplitDocumentResponse.description: Result of splitting a document into sub-documents

SubDocuments.description: The sub-documents that were identified and extracted from the input document

SubDocument.description: A sub-document extracted from a combined document

StartPage.description: Starting page number (1-indexed) of this sub-document in the original document

EndPage.description: Ending page number (1-indexed) of this sub-document in the original document

DocumentDescription.description: Description of the sub-document including document type and any identifying information such as person name

FileBytes.description: The extracted sub-document as PDF file bytes

TableResultCell.description: Cell of a row of a table extracted from a document

TableResultRow.description: Row of a table extracted from a document
